card.name: Star-Lord
card.property: Each ally you control gains the [[guardian]] trait. "What could go wrong?" â€” Interrupt: When you play a card from your hand, deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card â†’ reduce the cost to play that card by 3. (Limit once per round.)

alternate.name: Peter Quill
alternate.property: Setup: Search your deck and discard pile for a copy of the Element Gun upgrade and add it to your hand. Smooth Talker â€” Action: Choose a card in your hand. Swap that card with the top card of your deck. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Nova Prime
card.property: Response: After you play Nova Prime from your hand, defeat a non-[[elite]] minion.
"This is for Nova Corps!" - Nova Prime

card.name: Daring Escape
card.property: Hero Action Deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card â†’ ready your hero and draw 1 card.
"Okay, not to brag, but that was probably the bravest thing that anyone one of us has ever done." - Star-lord

card.name: Gutsy Move
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Remove 2 additional threat from that scheme for each facedown encounter card in front of you.

card.name: Sliding Shot
card.property: Play only if you control an Element Gun. Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Deal 2 additional damage to that enemy for each facedown encounter card in front of you.

card.name: Bad Boy
card.property: Hero Interrupt When you would take any amount of damage from the villain's attack, discard this card â†’ prevent all of that damage. Change to alter-ego form and draw 2 cards.
"Ridin' in style!" - Peter Quill

card.name: Element Gun
card.property: Restricted. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Element Gun and spend 1 resource of any type â†’ deal 3 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

card.name: Jet Boots
card.property: Star-Lord gains the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Interrupt: When Star-Lord would take any amount of damage, exhaust Jet Boots â†’ prevent 1 of that damage for each facedown encounter card in front of you.

card.name: Leader of the Guardians
card.property: Each [[guardian]] character you control gets +1 THW.
"I know we all hate each other and we all tried to kill one another. But from now on, and until the job is done, we're Guardians." - Peter Quill

card.name: Star-Lord's Helmet
card.property: While you are in hero form, you get +1 hand size for each facedown encounter card in front of you (to a maximum of +3 hand size)
"You can't see that I'm judging you, but I'm judging you." - Star-Lord

card.name: Adam Warlock
card.property: Response: After Adam Warlock attacks or thwarts, discard 1 card at random from your hand. If that card's printed resource has: [physical] - Remove 3 threat from a scheme. [energy] - Heal 3 damage from an identity [mental] - Deal 3 damage to an enemy [wild] - Choose one of the above.

card.name: Beta Ray Bill
card.property: Response: After Beta Ray Bill attacks and defeats a minion, remove 2 threat from the main scheme.

card.name: Yondu
card.property: Yondu's attacks gain ranged.

card.name: Air Supremacy
card.property: Hero Action: Choose up to X enemies, where X is equal to the number of [[aerial]] characters you control â†’ deal 3 damage to each chosen enemy.

card.name: Blaze of Glory
card.property: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Each [[guardian]] character gets +2 THW and +2 ATK this phase. At the end of the phase, deal 1 damage to each [[guardian]] character.

card.name: Target Practice
card.property: Interrupt: When an ally with a [[weapon]] attachment upgrade makes an attack, discard Target Practice â†’ that ally gets +2 ATK for that attack.
"Man, too easy." - Star-Lord

card.name: Laser Blaster
card.property: Attach to a [[guardian]] ally. Max 1 per ally. Attached ally gets +1 ATK and its attacks gain overkill.
"I'll make short work of you." - Nebula

card.name: Cosmo
card.property: Interrupt: When Cosmo attacks or thwarts, name a card type, then discard the top card of the deck. If that card is of the named type, Cosmo does not take consequential damage (the damage under THW or ATK) for this use.

card.name: C.I.T.T.
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust C.I.T.T. and spend 2 resources of any type â†’ ready a [[guardian]] character.
"I don't know, I kind of like calling it the Cool Interstellar Travel Travelship." - Peter Quill

card.name: Knowhere
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Increase your ally limit by 1. Response: After a player plays a [[guardian]] ally, exhaust Knowhere â†’ that player draws 1 card.

card.name: Pulse Grenade
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Discard Pulse Grenade and choose an enemy â†’ discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. Deal 1 damage to the chosen enemy for each boost icon discarded this way.

card.name: Dive Bomb
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy. Deal 1 damage to each other enemy.

card.name: Agile Flight
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Action (thwart): Remove a total of up to 5 threat from among schemes (as you choose).

card.name: Ever Vigilant
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Action: Ready your hero and remove 2 threat from the main scheme.
"I feel like I've got the while weight of the world on my shoulders." - Captain Marvel

card.name: Banishment
card.property: Give to the Peter Quill player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Peter Quill â†’ remove Banishment from the game. - Discard an Element Gun from play. If you cannot, place 3 threat on the main scheme. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Budding Crime Syndicate
card.property: Hinder 2 [per_hero]. (When revealed, place 2 [per_hero] threat here.)
"In your tiny head, the line between a criminal enterprise and an empire is thin. In reality, nobody cares. All they care about is who holds the gun." - J'son

card.name: Mister Knife
card.property: Retaliate 1. The first treachery the engaged player reveals each villain phase gains surge. (Star-Lord's nemesis minion.)

card.name: Spartoi Cunning
card.property: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from your hand, take 1 damage, and place 1 threat on the main scheme.
"How can you expect to win when the entire galaxy is against you?" - J'son
